Description: I gave gifts to all the enemies|What gifts?|Oh just some deadly weapons|........Merry Christmas!
Rules Description: All enemies gain a random item each turn|All enemies have 10% extra health
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Christmas Revolver~[;]~Equipment:Christmas Pistol~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Slush Ball~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Combat: target.innate.push(~gains a random item each turn~); inflict(~Karen Rule~);

Description: You are given gifts now|you happy?|Dont cry when its not what you want
Rules Description: Gain no items this run|Gain 2 random items each turn

Description: Sales Sales Sales! With the arrival of Christmas more shops|are opening up. All the monsters are trampling around|the shops in search of gifts. It's so bad that you won't get any.
Rules Description: Enemies leave [gold]2 gold after defeating them.|Shops are more common.|Make twice as many gadgets.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Creative Crisis~[;]~Equipment:Consumerism~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]rand([~Equipment:Iced Latte~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Kettle~])[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Hmm a time crunch you say?|Better do quick maths!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~][;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;]~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: It's time for a bedtime story! Give me three!
Rules Description: You can use 3 spellbooks.|Start with 4 dice and without prepared spell slot.|Your starter spells are [yellow]Fruit_Bowl[][comma] [yellow]Snapdragon[][comma] [yellow]Daffodil[].
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Sun Beam~[;]~Spell:Lucky 7~[;]~Spell:Moon Beam~[;] ~Spell:Cold Snap~][;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Lunasa~[;]  ~Spell:Honey Pot~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~ExtraDice:-650~[;] ~WitchUpgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~Spell:Mirror Cauldron~]);
Script: Start Game: Spellbook.setto([Spellbook.spellname(1)][;][][;]0); Spellbook.showspellbookinstructions = false; self.setvar(~spellbook1slot1~[;]~Fruit Bowl~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot3~[;]~Snapdragon~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot5~[;]~Daffodil~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]1); Rules.witch_randomspellslot[3] = [~Next Volume~]; Spellbook.disablethrowdice(); Rules.includeenemies([~Grinch~]); Rules.rulescreen(~bookwormrules~); Rules.excludeenemies([~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Drain Monster~[;]~Gardener~[;]~Stereohead~[;]~Sorceress~[;]~Singer~[;]~Audrey~]);

Description: As a special gift[;] Lady Luck's letting you|abandon your Deck and use equipment normally!|...Semi-normally. She may have a grudge.
Rules Description: You no longer use a deck|You start with 3 dice.|Only one card is available at a time
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shiny Sword~[;]~Equipment:Chaingun~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~[;] [~Equipment:Chainbump~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);

Description: (text should not appear)|(probably will at some point)
Script: Start Game: Rules.disableexp(); Rules.hpchangeonlevelup = 0; Rules.lowhpmusic = false; Rules.limitbreakcost = 3; Rules.rulescreen(~robotpuzzlerules~); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true;
Script: Change Floor: trace(~This will cause errors...~); /*for(e in self.equipment) { self.equipment.remove(e); }*/ self.destroyallequipment(); if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ giveequipment([~Frozen Gloves@robot~]|true|false); giveequipment([~Buster Sword~]|true|false); giveequipment([~Roll Tracker~]|true|false); self.roll_target = 9; } else if(getcurrentfloor() == 3){  } else if(getcurrentfloor() == 4){ } else if(getcurrentfloor() == 5){ } else if(getcurrentfloor() == 6){ } trace(~Errors should be done now!~);
